title: Figure of a Frog
description:
Pale green faience statuette of a seated frog, the head looking upward. Roughly triangular base, compact pyramidal form with mouth indicated by curved line and the eyes by circles. Almost no modeling. 
Condition: Several large firing holes in surface. Glaze worn, major portion of mouth restored.
